entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump @fema Excuse me but President Clinton is running a live event featuring top experts in public health, government, and philanthropy to discuss COVID-19 and how we can work together to overcome the complex health, economic, and societal challenges it presents. https://t.co/YHyUjLxcba
